details.sectionContent: This event will test the technical skills and logic application skills of the participants.
An event is a technical application and logic based treasure hunt on a PC.

This round is an aptitude test round where participants will be answering to the questions on their own device with the help of kahoot.Questions will be displayed on a projector screen.  Each question will have four options out of which one will be the correct answer.  Judging criteria will be on the basis of total number of correct answers.

Pen and paper based round.Here the questions will not have fixed answers. Answer getting lowest votes will be given more points and answers with majority votes will be given less points.Judging criteria will be points earned by the participants.

This round is a treasure hunt round.  Participants have to solve a riddle.Correct answer of the riddle will give them hint to reach the next riddle. After having solved all the riddles, participants will be able to reach the treasure and clear this round.

Date: 21/02/2018 
Round 1: 11:30 AM to 12:10 PM (Computer Department[C-205/206]) 
Round 2: 12:30 PM to 1:30 PM (Computer Department[C-205/206]) 
Date:22/02/2018 

Round 3: 11:00 AM to 12:40 PM(COMP Dept 1st floor(F1-F6))
